## Favorite Plot

```{r}
datasaurus <- read.csv('datasaurus.csv')
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
dino <- datasaurus %>%
  filter(dataset == "dino")

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(dino, aes(x,y)) +
  geom_point(size = 2, color = "darkgreen") +
  theme(panel.background = element_blank())
  
```
